abstract.t: This document describes a new Phase I mode for IKE [RFC-2409] basedon the ISAKMP [RFC-2408] Base Exchange. The purpose of this newexchange is to allow support of all authentication methods with fixedand non-fixed IP addresses, while offering protection against adenial of service attack aimed at costly operations. It also enablesnegotiation capabilities beyond those offered by Aggressive Mode(DH/EC group). The exchange consists of only four messages andtherefor is useful when performance is crucial.
